definition: red-letterhead document, an official document with the name of the issuing government agency printed in red at the top, circulated to relevant bodies
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: First of all, the visual value of red tape far outweigh the constructive .
sentences.chinese: 首先，紅頭文件的觀賞性遠遠大於其建設性。
